Ahora voy a crear el archivo llms.txt con todo el contenido compilado. El archivo llms.txt es un formato estándar para documentar recursos de IA/LLM. Voy a crear un archivo con estructura clara:

```
# Inled Group - Apps and Projects Documentation

## Metadata
Title: Inled Group - Apps Store and Projects
URL: https://apps.inled.es/ and https://inled.es/proyectos/
Description: Complete documentation of Inled Group's open-source applications and projects ecosystem
Last Updated: 2025-12-20

---

## Overview

Inled Group is an open-source organization dedicated to creating high-quality applications and services. All applications are licensed under GNU GPLv3.0 with an emphasis on privacy and open-source principles.

---

## Inled Open Store - Applications

### 1. Swiftinstall
**Platform:** Linux
**Type:** Native App
**Description:** Install, uninstall and manage .deb and .appimage packages easily
**URL:** https://inled.es/apps/swiftinstall/

**Features:**
- Open Source
- 100% visual process
- High quality software with extensive testing before release
- Install applications graphically from .deb or .appimage packages
- Uninstall any app visually
- Fix dependency errors
- Analyze system for viruses
- Clean system garbage
- Modern appearance

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/swiftinstall/releases/download/v8.0/swiftinstall8.1-ui-fix.deb
- SourceForge: https://sourceforge.net/projects/swiftinstall/files/latest/download
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/swiftinstall

---

### 2. Warp VPN GUI
**Platform:** Linux
**Type:** Native App
**Description:** Simple graphical interface to manage Cloudflare's free Warp VPN

**Features:**
- 100% visual interface
- No learning curve
- High quality, reviewed and tested software
- Network security thanks to 1.1.1.1
- Avoid IP blocks and bans

**Installation:**
- Via Swiftinstall: Download .deb → Open Swiftinstall → Select package → Click Install
- Via dpkg: Execute `dpkg -i warp-exec-v1.deb`

**Requirements:**
- Warp VPN installed: https://pkg.cloudflareclient.com/#debian
- Warp activated: https://developers.cloudflare.com/warp-client/get-started/linux/

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/warpvpn-gui/releases/download/v1.0/warp-exec-v1.deb
- SourceForge: https://sourceforge.net/projects/warpvpn-gui/files/latest/download
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/warpvpn-gui

---

### 3. Start Omnibox
**Platforms:** Chrome, Edge
**Type:** Extension
**Description:** Use any search engine you want. Easy, in 3 clicks.

**Features:**
- Choose your search engine from Start Omnibox dropdown
- No need to visit each search engine's page
- Quick switching between search engines

**Installation:**
1. Download and extract the zip
2. Enable Developer Mode and upload the extension
3. In Chrome/Edge extensions section, activate Developer Mode in top right corner
4. Click "Load unpacked" in the dropdown
5. Activate the extension

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/start-omnibox/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/start-omnibox

---

### 4. Cruz Cristiana para GNOME
**Platforms:** Linux (GNOME)
**Type:** Native App
**Description:** Shows the cross of Christ so that God's presence is with you.

**Features:**
- Display Christian cross in GNOME bar
- Constant companion of faith while using Linux
- Free and open source
- Spiritual support in digital format

**Downloads:**
- GNOME Extensions: https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/8060/christian-cross-in-gnome-bar/
- Source Code: https://github.com/jaimegh-es/cruzcristiana-gnome

---

### 5. Memory Warn
**Platform:** Linux
**Type:** Native App
**Description:** Warns when your computer's memory usage exceeds an established threshold

**Features:**
- Block prevention
- Alert when threshold is exceeded
- Adaptable monitoring frequency
- Visual interface
- High quality code with strict reviews for security and reliability

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/memory-warn/releases/download/v1.0/memory-warn.deb
- SourceForge: https://sourceforge.net/projects/memory-warn/files/latest/download
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/memory-warn

---

### 6. Start New Tab Page
**Platforms:** Chrome, Edge
**Type:** Extension
**Description:** Experience productivity with Start as your home page.

**Features:**
- Set Start as new tab page
- Set Start as startup page
- Set Start as home page
- Productivity-focused design

**Installation:**
1. Download and extract the zip
2. Enable Developer Mode in extensions section
3. Click "Load unpacked"
4. Activate the extension

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/start.newtab.chrome/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/start.newtab.chrome

---

### 7. Windows Error
**Platform:** Mac
**Type:** Native App
**Description:** Enjoy the Windows XP error window on your Mac.

**Features:**
- Fun window mimicking classic Windows XP errors
- Completely harmless - no actual damage to Mac
- Open source code for security verification
- Easy installation process

**Installation Notes:**
- Application is not "notarized" (not signed with Apple developer ID)
- Must remove quarantine: `xattr -d com.apple.quarantine WindowsError\ 2.app`

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/windowserror/releases/download/v2.0/WindowsError2.zip
- SourceForge: https://sourceforge.net/projects/windowserror/files/latest/download
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/windowserror

---

### 8. WinBSOD
**Platform:** Mac
**Type:** Native App
**Description:** Simulate the Windows Blue Screen of Death on your Mac.

**Features:**
- Nostalgic simulation of Windows BSOD
- Perfect for nostalgia or making Mac look more like Windows
- Harmless simulation
- Available for Mac users

**Installation Notes:**
- Not "notarized" - must use: `xattr -d com.apple.quarantine BSOD.app`

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/Inled-Group/winbsod/releases/download/v1.0/BSOD.app.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/winbsod

---

### 9. Tabstacker
**Platforms:** Chrome, Edge
**Type:** Extension
**Description:** Save tabs, send them and do everything with them easily

**Features:**
- Save browser tabs easily
- Share tabs via instant messaging or email
- Reopen grouped tabs without hassle
- Private functionality (unlike other tools)
- Easy tab management

**Installation:**
- Enable Developer Mode in Chrome or derivatives
- Upload the extracted .zip

**Status:** Currently in improvement - automatic update system coming soon

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/tabstacker/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/tabstacker

---

### 10. Cleany
**Platforms:** Chrome, Edge
**Type:** Extension
**Description:** Perfect extension for public or shared computers

**Features:**
- Close sessions
- Delete browsing history
- Clear cookies
- Clean form data
- Runs automatically when browser opens without slowing it down
- Ideal for public computer security

**Installation:**
1. Download and extract .zip
2. Enable Developer Mode in Chrome extensions page
3. Upload the extension folder

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/cleany/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/cleany

---

### 11. Open in Archive.is
**Platforms:** Chrome, Edge
**Type:** Extension
**Description:** Open the page in archive.is with one click

**Features:**
- One-click access to archive.is
- Access unlimited content through multiple page captures
- View webpage snapshots

**Installation:**
1. Download .zip and extract
2. Go to browser Extensions page (not store, the installed extensions page)
3. Enable Developer Mode
4. Click "Load unpacked"

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/open-url-archive.is/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/open-url-archive.is

---

### 12. Startchat
**Platforms:** Mac, Windows, Linux
**Type:** Native App
**Description:** Chat on the same WiFi network, without external servers

**Features:**
- Local WiFi chat without external servers
- Act as both chat server and conversation page
- Multiple pre-configured servers for ports 8080, 8081, 8082
- Default server provides UI

**Requirements:**
- Node.js installed

**Execution:**
1. Install Node.js
2. Navigate to Startchat folder in terminal
3. Execute: `npm install` then `node server.js`

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/startchat/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/startchat

---

### 13. InShare
**Platforms:** Mac, Windows, Linux
**Type:** Native App
**Description:** Share files through local network in 100% private way

**Features:**
- Personal document drop (Dropbox-like for local network)
- Share from phone to PC and vice versa
- Works on any operating system
- No app installation needed - just run a simple server
- 100% private file sharing

**Requirements:**
- Node.js installed

**Execution:**
1. Install Node.js
2. Navigate to InShare folder in terminal
3. Execute: `npm install` then `node server.js`

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/inshare/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/inshare

---

### 14. Moodle Notifier
**Platforms:** Chrome, Edge
**Type:** Extension
**Description:** Stay updated with Moodle platform notifications

**Comprehensive Features:**
- Automatic popup on Chrome startup showing pending tasks
- Sound notification for pending tasks or reminders
- Periodic task verification every 5 minutes
- Direct access to activities from popup
- Postpone tasks for 20 minutes with visual countdown timer
- Mark activities as viewed to hide from main list
- View all tasks (including marked as viewed) with option to unmark
- Hamburger menu with quick access to all functions
- Secure authentication using official Moodle API
- Intuitive interface for task management

**Requirements:**
- Google Chrome or Chromium-based browser
- Moodle platform account
- Moodle platform must have "moodle_mobile_app" web service enabled

**Installation:**
1. Open Chrome and go to chrome://extensions/
2. Enable "Developer Mode" in top right corner
3. Click "Load unpacked extension"
4. Select moodlenotifier folder

**Configuration:**
1. Click extension icon in toolbar
2. Enter Moodle settings:
   - Moodle URL (e.g., https://moodle.example.com)
   - Username
   - Password
3. Click "Save Configuration"

**Usage:**
- Tasks automatically display on Chrome startup
- 5-minute periodic verification
- Hamburger menu for: Update Tasks, View All Tasks, Change Settings
- Three buttons per task: Open, Postpone 20min, Mark Viewed
- Real-time countdown timer for postponed tasks

**Security:**
- Local credential storage in browser
- Official Moodle API authentication
- No third-party data sharing
- Secure HTTPS update verification

**Troubleshooting:**
- Verify correct Moodle URL (no trailing slash)
- Check username and password
- Ensure Moodle web service is enabled
- Verify API enabled: https://moodle.example.com/login/token.php?username=USER&password=PASS&service=moodle_mobile_app

**Technologies:**
- Manifest V3 (latest Chrome extension version)
- Moodle Web API
- Chrome Storage API
- Chrome Notifications API
- Chrome Alarms API

**Downloads:**
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup/moodlenotifier/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
- Source Code: https://github.com/InledGroup/moodlenotifier

---

## Inled Projects Ecosystem

### Main Services

1. **Start** - Fast search, instant access. Multi-search engine and home page.
   - URL: https://start.inled.es/

2. **Songbird** - AI-generated music with human-created titles.
   - URL: https://suno.com/@songbird_music

3. **MDPDF** - Free Markdown Editor and MD to PDF converter.
   - URL: https://mdpdf.inled.es/

4. **InDoc** - Online text editor.
   - URL: https://indoc.inled.es/

5. **InMD** - Only free visual Markdown editor.
   - URL: https://inmd.inled.es/

6. **InLinked** - LinkedIn post formatter with private AI.
   - URL: https://inlinked.inled.es/

7. **InPDF** - PDF viewer with AI for browser.
   - URL: https://inpdf.inled.es/

8. **InQR** - Link, WiFi and barcode QR code generator. Private and secure.
   - URL: https://inqr.inled.es/

9. **Inled AI** - Future of local and free AI.
   - URL: https://ai.inled.es/

10. **Domain Info** - Get information about a domain or IP address.
    - URL: https://status.inled.es/ipcheck.html

11. **Devreka** - Business idea generator for developers.
    - URL: https://devreka.inled.es/

12. **Matrix WWW** - Website with Matrix software simulations.
    - URL: https://matrix-www.inled.es/

13. **Glassy** - Create beautiful liquid glass style SVGs from normal ones.
    - URL: https://glassy.inled.es/

---

## Organization Information

**Name:** Inled Group
**Website:** https://inled.es/
**License:** GNU GPLv3.0

### Contact & Legal
- Privacy Policy: https://inled.es/privacy-policy
- Cookie Policy: https://inled.es/cookie-policy

### Social Links
- GitHub: https://github.com/InledGroup
- YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@inledgroup
- Mastodon: https://mastodon.social/@inled
- SourceForge: https://sourceforge.net/u/inledgroup/profile/

### Core Values
- Open Source First: All software is licensed under GNU GPLv3.0
- Privacy Focused: No data collection or sharing with third parties
- Quality Oriented: Extensive testing and code reviews before release
- User-Centric: Design focused on solving real user problems

---

## Technology Stack

### Applications Use
- Native Apps: Python, C, JavaScript/Node.js
- Extensions: JavaScript (Manifest V3)
- Web Services: Modern web technologies (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript)

### Development Practices
- Strict code quality reviews
- Extensive testing before release
- Open source development on GitHub
- Community-driven improvements

---

## API Documentation

**Open Store API:** https://apps.inled.es/api/docs

For developers interested in integrating with Inled Group, please contact at contacto@inled.es
